content: here s a lovely textured crochet star stitch hat the entire work is constructed using the side-to-side method both the folded-over ribbing and the top section crown are made at the same time one end of the work contains the half_double_crochet ribbing while the other end contains the star stitch the ribbing looks like a knitted ribbing due to alternating the front and back loops of the hdcs a faux fur pompom is sewn on top for decoration there is a step-by-step tutorial video for this pattern
